author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unisys Reports Q1 EPS $0.62
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Unisys Corp:
* UNISYS ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS; OPERATING MARGIN EXPANDS YEAR-OVER-YEAR; COMPANY REAFFIRMS FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL GUIDANCE
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.62 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19
* Q1 REVENUE $708.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $654.4 MILLION
* SERVICES BACKLOG AT QUARTER-END WAS UP 26 PERCENT YEAR-OVER-YEAR AND 10 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY, TO $4.7 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
